remarks: Convert an operation closure law to class notation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2014.)
statement:
caovclg.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. C /\ y e. D ) ) -> ( x F y ) e. E ) $.
caovclg $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) ) -> ( A F B ) e. E ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d E x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d ph x y $.
